name: Jomey Demo
description:
The long awaited 'JOMEY DEMO' is here!

A game about Jomey, a little green character with a dream so grand it could span the entire sky. Help him take a school project further than he could ever imagine by wielding all kinds of sweet treats against his enemies and building an UNSTOPPABLE team of WINNERS.

The JOMEY DEMO is available on Windows and Mac OS.



Featuring:
• The opening act of the FULL 'Jomey' experience
• Jomey, a youthful character with a grand dream
• Accessible, easy to learn Bullet-Hell-Kicking-Adventure gameplay
• Clarity loving, beautiful pixel art
• A game where you can finally "Talk to these Creatures"
• Make an admirable friend
• Over 15 drinks for Jomey to enjoy
• OVER 2, and MAYBE EVEN 3 hours of fun
• A world of sunlit springtime to explore
• An accompanying whimsical soundtrack
• A "filled to the brim" number of surprises and secrets
• The "Jomey Halloween Hack" a bonus horror-adventure
• John Chorsley, the interactive horse pet. Feed him. Watch him dance!


CREDITS:

Game by TEAM JOMEY (Giamo, Chumby, somefeatures)

Giamo: Director, Designer, Programming, Writing, Sound, 3D Elements

Chumby: Artist, Co-Director, Design

somefeatures: Music, Writing assistance

Additional Credits:
EP: 'Jomey' Logo design
Kerolense: Secret area music (main and boss themes)
Jacob Eby: Additional Guitars
Mario 2: Jomey Halloween Hack, Testing
Chai: Promotional Art
Derune: Chorsley gif, Lightning effect, Testing
Chitinlink: Testing
Samuel: Frog in the Bog

Also thanks to: A bunch of Youtube videos I took ambience from, Gamemaker tutorials
